Get rides for a date interval on a specified area :param date_gt: date greater than or equal :param date_lt: date lower than or equal :param areaid: ID of area rides belong to :return: array of rides that meet the provided criteria

getRidesForTimeAndVechicleId(started_at, date, areaid, bird_id)¶

Get rides for a specified time and vehicle id. Intended to verify duplicates :param started_at: time ride started at :param date: date when ride took place :param areaid: ID of area ride belongs to :param bird_id: id of vehicle of ride :return: dictionary containing iride that meets the provided criteria

getRidesForTimeIntervalAndArea(date, time_gt, time_lt, areaid)¶

Get rides between a provided time interval and an area :param time_gt: time greater than or equal :param time_lt: time lower than or equal :param areaid: ID of area rides belong to :return: array of rides that meet the provided criteria

getRidesWithCoordinates(start_lat, start_lon)¶

Get rides that meet the provided coordinates :param start_lat: starting latitude :param start_lon: start longitude :return: all rides that meet the starting coordinates provided
